com.github.webapp_minifier.options.ParseOptionException

  • Packages that use ParseOptionException 
    Package Description
    com.github.webapp_minifier
    The Webapp Minifier plugin minifies CSS and JavaScript either embedded in or reference by HTML files.
    com.github.webapp_minifier.options
    Provides options for the plugin.
    com.github.webapp_minifier.replacer
    Contains classes that handle parsing HTML and replacing content within those files.
